Title: Organelles: The Emerging Signalling Chart of Mitochondrial Dynamics
Abstract: © 2017 Elsevier LtdMany molecular and functional details of single events in mitochondrial dynamics have been reported, but little is known about their coordination. A recent study describes how cellular Ca2+ signals, via remodelling the actin cytoskeleton, synchronise the formation of endoplasmic reticulum–mitochondria contacts with inner and outer mitochondrial membrane fission.
